about_the_game:
Stratum Descent is a rogue-lite card game where you craft your cards and increase not only its effects but its cost to play. The rarer the card the more you are able to customize it.

Take your cards on a journey to defeat the stratum lords and delve deeper and deeper.

On your journey you will encounter events, cities, monsters and find even more powerful cards, stones and relics.

How deep will you descend?

Forging Cards

  • Slot cards with various effects
  • Raise or lower the cost of cards
  • Crystalize cards to add its effects to a new card

Character Upgrades

  • Increase health
  • Increase energy
  • Increase drop rate
  • Increase fragment gain

Stratums

Each stratum has its own theme as well as its own set of monsters and specific stratum lord. Each stratum increases in difficulty as well as increases in length.

Relics

Relics are dropped by monsters you defeat. You are able to equip relics when going on a new journey. Relics will increase effects as well as power up your character for that run.

name: Stratum Descent Demo
short_description: Forge your destiny and descend the stratums. Stratum Descent is a deckbuilding rogue-lite where your strength is determined by how well you forge and upgrade cards. Change cards to match your play style and see how far you can descend. But be wary because you could lose it all.
